1.title: Shifu's Ex

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

1.plot: (Potential Valentine's Day Episode) When Shifu's ex-girlfriend, Mei Ling, visits the Jade Palace, Po decides to try and get them back together, despite the fact Mei Ling is now Shifu's most hated enemy.

2.title: War of the Noodles

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

2.plot: Thanks to Po, Hundun opens up his own noodle shop in the village, threatening to put Mr. Ping out of business.

3.title: The Break-Up

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

3.plot: When two Croc Bandits have a spat, it's up to Po and Mr. Ping to make things right.

4.title: Mind Over Manners

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

4.plot: During a fight with Tong Fo, Po is struck by lightning, which gives him the power to read minds.

5.title: A Thousand and Twenty Questions

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

5.plot: Master Yao returns for a public event where he will answer any question for anyone offering any kind of new experience.

6.title: The Way of the Prawn

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

6.plot: Over Po's objections, Shifu calls in a noble Samurai prawn to help take down a villain from Japan.

7.title: Mouth Off

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

7.plot: Shifu suggests Po takes a vow of silence to help him focus, but his plan goes awry when the panda starts an armed conflict by keeping his mouth shut.

8.title: Serpent's Tooth

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

8.plot: Once deemed a hero, cobra Fu-xi has turned renegade and is attacking the Valley of Peace. When the villagers adopt an anti-snake sentiment, will Viper help stop Fu-xi...or join him?

9.title: The Goosefather

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

9.plot: The local thugs love Mr. Ping's soup so much, the noodle shop becomes a villain hangout...with Mr. Ping as their unknowing crime boss!

10.title: Po Picks a Pocket

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

10.plot: Po befriends a group of young (and adorable) orphans--who also happen to be stealing money and goods from the villagers. Will Po be able to reform the kids or fall into the clutches of their evil leader?

11.title: Croc You Like a Hurricane

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

11.plot: Shifu grows tired of Po complaining and puts him in charge of training the Furious Five.

12.title: Crazy Little Ling Called Love

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

12.plot: Po is suspicious when Shifu gets back together with his evil ex-girlfriend, Mei Ling.

13.title: Kung Fu Club

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

13.plot: When Shifu sends Po to shut down an underground fight club, the panda disobeys his master and joins the club instead.

14.title: The Hunger Game

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

14.plot: Po and the Five have to stop a famine by bringing a maniacal gang of food-thieving rats to justice. But, will Po's weakness for food alienate himself from his friends and the very villagers he is trying to help?

15.title: A Stitch in Time

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

15.plot: Po discovers the seeds of Shuyong: magical items that can actually take the user back in time. After Po disobeys Shifu, evil Fenghuang steals one of the seeds, putting the entire world in danger.

16.title: Eternal Chord

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

16.plot: Po's qi is out of balance, and Shifu and wise Master Lun attempt to re-harmonize the panda using the ancient tradition of musical kung fu. They better work fast, as only Po can stop the evil Yaoguai, who are intent on destroying the Eternal Chord and un-creating the universe.

17.title: Apocalypse Yao

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

17.plot: Po must help Master Yao when Taotie and Bian Zao steal the secrets of kung fu.

18.title: The Real Dragon Warrior

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

18.plot: Po and Monkey discover a small village and meet an impostor claiming to be the Dragon Warrior.

19.title: The First Five

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

19.plot: Po throws a party and invites the First Furious Five to attend.

20.title: Emperor's Rule

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

20.plot: Po becomes Head of Imperial Security when Lu Kang returns to the Valley of Peace as Emperor. When an evil menace rises, Po has to turn to some surprising allies to save the day.

21.title: Youth in Re-Volt

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

21.plot: Bian Zao steals magical lightning powers and teams up with Tong Fo and the Croc Bandits; Po and Taotie must keep Bian Zao from destroying the village.

22.title: See No Weevil

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

22.plot: See No Weevil: General Tsin is back with a theory about alien rice weevils trying to take over the world. When Po learns Tsin is telling the truth, it's up to him to stop the invasion!

23.title: Face Full of Fear

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

23.plot: Face Full of Fear: With his childhood bully back in town, Po must learn to face his fear or risk losing his Dragon Warrior mojo and those that are most important to him.

24.title: Forsaken and Furious

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

24.plot: The Furious Five go on strike as everyone in the entire village, including Shifu of all people, not only shows Po excessive favoritism but even disowns the Five for not being as cool as him.

25.title: Camp Ping

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

25.plot: Camp Ping: Shifu and Mr. Ping compete for Po's attention and affection during a camping trip. But will their competition get in the way of Po defeating the Valley's newest menace?

26.title: Po the Croc

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

26.plot: Po the Croc: After a blow to the head leaves Po with amnesia, Fung and the Croc Bandits use it to their advantage by convincing the Dragon Warrior that he is their evil bandit leader.

27.title: Goose Chase

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

27.plot: Goose Chase: After Zeng unhappily quits his job at the Jade Palace, Po cheers up the weepy goose by telling him he could be a kung fu master. Bad idea, Po. Bad idea.

1.title: Scorpion's Sting

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

1.plot: When Tigress comes down with a dangerous disease, Po and Monkey must find a rare flower to cure, but a renegade scorpion healer is determined to stop them.

2.title: The Princess and the Po

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

2.plot: Po, Tigress and Mantis must escort an obnoxious princess to a nation as part of a peace deal.

3.title: Sticky Situation

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

3.plot: When Po accidentally wrecks the training room, he goes to its co-designer to ask him to repair it, unaware of his enmity against Shifu.

4.title: Chain Reaction

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

4.plot: While transporting an important column, Po and Tigress's attempt to defend it against bandits is complicated when they are chained together.

5.title: Fluttering Finger Mindslip

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

5.plot: Po discovers and overuses an ancient technique that can suppress a person's memories.

6.title: Good Croc, Bad Croc

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

6.plot: Po gets suckered by Fung to break into a castle.

7.title: Hometown Hero

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

7.plot: Po follows Mantis to his hometown and agrees to help him impress an old girlfriend.

8.title: Jailhouse Panda

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

8.plot: Po goes undercover, as the goat Shang, in prison to find out where Tong Fo has hidden a sacred war hammer of LayLang.

9.title: Owl Be Back

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

9.plot: Fearing his own corruption at becoming the most powerful of Shifu's students, Po leaves and encounters one of Shifu's contemporaries who suffered that fate.

10.title: Bad Po

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

10.plot: Po accidentally creates an evil twin of himself.

11.title: Sight for Sore Eyes

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

11.plot: When a villainous rival of Master Shifu manipulates Po into breaking an important rule, the consequences allow him to become Grand Master of the Jade Palace.

12.title: Rhino's Revenge

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

12.plot: Po tries to help a former rhino guard of Chor-Gom Prison, but things get out of hand.

13.title: Master Ping

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

13.plot: With his restaurant closed for repairs, Mr. Ping bunks at the Jade Palace, only to make a nuisance of himself while some thugs mistake him for Master Shifu.

14.title: Ghost of Oogway

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

14.plot: Po encounters the ghost of Master Oogway, who seems strangely bent on causing dissension in the Jade Palace.

15.title: The Kung Fu Kid

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

15.plot: Po meets and grows jealous of a precocious and likable snow leopard who seems to outclass him in every way.

16.title: Ladies of the Shade

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

16.plot: A gang of female snow leopards manipulate Po into letting them into the Jade Palace and they rob it.

17.title: Big Bro Po

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

17.plot: After Po and the Five capture Taotie, Po feels obliged to help the villain's disaffected son, Bian Zao.

18.title: Po Fans Out

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

18.plot: Po discovers he has a fan club, but his drive to impress them leads to making a serious mistake.

19.title: Challenge Day

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

19.plot: Shifu's ploy to humble Po backfires when the master claims that anyone can challenge the Panda for his Dragon Warrior title on one special day.

20.title: My Favorite Yao

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

20.plot: Shifu's personal hero arrives at the Jade Palace, but in his overenthusiasm, Shifu accidentally lets him run amok while Temutai schemes to abduct him.

21.title: In with the Old

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

21.plot: When the Furious 5 are all out of town and the Jade Palace is attacked, Po only has his dad and two old people to help him.

22.title: Has-Been Hero

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

22.plot: Po's kung fu hero comes to town for an exhibition match. But the hero is all washed up and asks Po to throw a fight to make him famous again.

23.title: Love Stings

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

23.plot: Po sets up his father, Mr. Ping, on a series of unsuccessful dates, only to find out Mr. Ping already has a girlfriend. Po's happiness for his dad is short lived when he finds out the mystery lady's identity.

24.title: Hall of Lame

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

24.plot: Po needs to find an awesome Dragon Warrior trophy for the Hall of Heroes or be humiliated in front of the entire village at the upcoming Warrior Festival.

25.title: Father Crime

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

25.plot: When Shifu's con-man father comes back into town, Po finds himself in the middle.

26.title: Monkey in the Middle

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

26.plot: A rash of thefts in the Valley of Peace has the villagers in uproar and things only get worse when the culprit appears to be....Monkey?

1.title: Kung Fu Day Care

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

1.plot: Tigress is forced to babysit a small child who has been separated from his parents.

2.title: Royal Pain

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

2.plot: Po takes on the challenge of training a lovable but klutzy member of the Emperor's family. However, will Po's training be enough to protect them both from the evil designs of a traitor in their midst?

3.title: The Most Dangerous Po

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

3.plot: Po is sent to visit a famous general, only to find him engaged in an insane hobby.

4.title: The Po Who Cried Ghost

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

4.plot: Halloween Episode: Po's worse childhood fears come true when he comes face to face with Hopping Ghosts!

5.title: Kung Shoes

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

5.plot: In an attempt to get out of training, Po buys some enchanted shoes that heighten his kung fu abilities. Unfortunately for Po, the magical shoes are evil and will soon put him and all those around him in great danger.

6.title: Bosom Enemies

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

6.plot: After dealing Taotie yet another humiliating defeat, Po is horrified to learn that the villainous warthog has had a full on nervous breakdown. Po is determined to heal his spirit and Taotie is eager to change his evil ways.

7.title: Enter the Dragon

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

7.plot: Po and the Furious Five meet their greatest challenge yet: a supernatural creature who is invincible to the powers of kung fu.

8.title: Master and the Panda

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

8.plot: When Po's friend Peng returns to the Valley of Peace, everyone is excited...except for Po. What no one else knows is that Peng is actually Tai Lung's nephew. Now Po has to admit to Peng that he skadooshed his uncle.

9.title: Present Tense

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

9.plot: As the annual Winter Festival approaches, Po doesn't have enough money to buy his dad the awesome present he deserves, so he takes a job as a bounty hunter to capture a dangerous escaped convict for the reward.

10.title: Shifu's Back

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

10.plot: When Shifu throws out his back, Po has to sit in as master of the Jade Palace.

11.title: Terror Cotta

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

11.plot: Fung finds an old scroll with instructions for making living terra cotta warriors, and soon it's up to Po and the Five to stop his monstrous clay creation.

12.title: The Spirit Orbs of Master Ding

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

12.plot: When Po is possessed by the ghost of evil Master Ding, it's up to Tigress to save him before Ding can unleash his powers and enslave the Valley of Peace.

13.title: The Maltese Mantis

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

13.plot: Po and Mantis visit the equivalent of an ancient Chinese Comic-Con, where Po's fanboy enthusiasm gets out of hand.

14.title: Invitation Only

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

14.plot: Po is sad when he learns that everyone has been invited to a dinner party except for him, due to his poor table manners. Will Shifu be able to teach Po proper etiquette AND foil the attack of evil Temutai and his army?

15.title: The Midnight Stranger

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

15.plot: When kung fu is outlawed, Po turns to donning a mask to fight crime.

16.title: Shoot the Messenger

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

16.plot: Po and Tigress must track down and stop a messenger from delivering a scroll that could thrust China into all-out war!

17.title: Tigress Tale

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

17.plot: When Master Mugan from the Garnet Palace decides she needs a new Kung Fu Maser, Tigress volunteers. Will the Furious Five be minus one or will Po convince Tigress to return to the Jade Palace?

18.title: Crane on a Wire

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

18.plot: Po tries to help Crane get his "mojo" back after Crane is humiliated at a charity event.

19.title: The Secret Museum of Kung Fu

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

19.plot: With Po and the Furious Five at each other's throats, Shifu takes them all on a disastrous road trip.

20.title: Bride of Po

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

20.plot: Po saves a girl from some bandits, only to learn that she's engaged to be married to the Dragon Warrior.

21.title: Five Is Enough

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

21.plot: When Master Chao arrives to oversee a tournament, Shifu is convinced that Po and Chao want him replaced. Then Shifu's old enemy Pai Mei shows up and threatens to destroy him.

22.title: Mama Told Me Not to Kung Fu

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

22.plot: Crane's mom visits the Valley of Peace. Crane reveals to Po that his mom hates Kung Fu so he promised her that he would never have anything to do with it. Crane asks Po and the others to help him keep his secret from his mom.

23.title: Secret Admirer

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

23.plot: (Potential Valentine's Day Episode)When Po's fake love letter prank on Monkey backfires, the duo's relationship is put to the test in a story of jealousy, betrayal and, yes, even kidnapping.

24.title: Qilin Time

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

24.plot: Po is embarrassed when his dad takes him on a wild goose chase, but it turns out his dad is not so crazy after all.

25.title: Huge

episode of.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness (TV Series 2011–2016)

25.plot: Self-conscious about his size, Mantis ingests a growth potion that makes him huge. Mantis is initially thrilled with the results, but soon his large size puts the entire village and his friends in grave danger.

imdb.plot outline: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness tells the continuing adventures of Po as he trains, protects, fights, teaches, learns, stumbles, talks too much, and geeks out as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in the barracks with the Furious Five, Po will have to take on his many new responsibilities, his many new adversaries, and his many old pounds in the continuing adventures of the Dragon Warrior. And kick some serious boo-tay.
imdb.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
plot: The further adventures of Po the Dragon Warrior and his friends.::Kenneth Chisholm

_Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness_ (qv) tells the continuing adventures of Po as he trains, protects, fights, teaches, learns, stumbles, talks too much, and geeks out as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in the barracks with the Furious Five, Po will have to take on his many new responsibilities, his many new adversaries, and his many old pounds in the continuing adventures of the Dragon Warrior. And kick some serious boo-tay.::Spottedstar

This computer-animated series follows the adventures of Po, the energetic Dragon Warrior panda first introduced in the popular "Kung Fu Panda" feature film. Po, aided by mentor Shifu and the Furious Five -- Tigress, Mantis, Crane, Monkey and Viper -- now lives at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five and takes on new responsibilities while facing new adversaries as he continues his Dragon Warrior education.::Jwelch5742
